formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Unique name for the plugin configuration.

formElement.label: Topaz CLI Agent:
formElement.documentation: The name of the agent for the machine where the Topaz Command-Line Interface tools are installed.

formElement.label: Topaz CLI Directory:
formElement.documentation: The absolute directory path on the Topaz CLI Agent machine where the Topaz Command-Line Interface tools are installed.

formElement.label: Topaz CLI Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The absolute directory path on the Topaz CLI Agent machine of the default workspace to use with the Topaz Command-Line Interface tools.

formElement.label: JRE Home Directory:
formElement.documentation: The directory path on the Topaz CLI Agent machine of the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to use with the Topaz Command-Line Interface tools.

formElement.label: Mainframe Host Name or IP:
formElement.documentation: The z/OS mainframe host addess or IP address.

formElement.label: Mainframe Port:
formElement.documentation: The z/OS mainframe host port number.

formElement.label: Mainframe Credential:
formElement.documentation: The credentials to use to connect to the z/OS mainframe host.
